tool_description: The Email Validation API is a robust solution for validating email addresses, providing essential details such as mail domain, IP address, mail server, and identifying disposable email addresses. With a user-friendly endpoint, this API seamlessly integrates with your application, ensuring email address accuracy. It offers a free tier and cost-effective paid plans to suit your validation needs.
name: Email Address Validator
title: Email Address Validator

api_list.name: Validate Email Address
api_list.description: REST API endpoint to validate a email address and retrieve information about the email address, such as, Domain, Mail Server, IP Address, Location etc. for the email address.
